movie.title: The Ladykillers
movie.description_intro: A remake of the 1955 comedy, the story revolves around a Southern professor who puts together a group of thieves to rob a casino. They rent a room in an old woman's house, but soon she discovers the plot and they must kill her, a task that is more difficult than it seems.
movie.description_full: A remake of the 1955 comedy, the story revolves around a Southern professor who puts together a group of thieves to rob a casino. They rent a room in an old woman's house, but soon she discovers the plot and they must kill her, a task that is more difficult than it seems.

movies.title: Vampires vs. the Bronx
movies.summary: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.
movies.description_full: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.
movies.synopsis: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

movies.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
movies.summary: What if you saved a souvenir from every relationship you've ever been in? THE BROKEN HEARTS GALLERY follows the always unique Lucy (Geraldine Viswanathan), a 20-something art gallery assistant living in New York City, who also happens to be an emotional hoarder. After she gets dumped by her latest boyfriend, Lucy is inspired to create The Broken Heart Gallery, a pop-up space for the items love has left behind. Word of the gallery spreads, encouraging a movement and a fresh start for all the romantics out there, including Lucy herself.

movies.title: Perfectly Prudence
movies.summary: Versatile technician Nigel and daughter Annie MacIntyre, officially her producer, are the only people people classy Prudence McCoy lets intervene in the traditional show on household tips she presents, third generation. But the TV station was bought by a tycoon, who sends his son Michael Merchant to modernize the show, assisted by studio executive Jack Jameson, Prue's ex. That includes a make over and, even worse, co-host Angelica Adams, an immature bikini whether program presenter, who looks up to 'maternal' Prue. Her counter-move is no less daring.

movies.title: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movies.title_english: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movies.title_long: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death (1974)
movies.summary: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.
